title: Satin CreditCare Network reports 33% YoY jump in March quarter
description: Satin CreditCare Network's net profit rose 33% to Rs 125 crore in March quarter, driven by robust growth. Assets under management increased by 34% in FY24. The company achieved its highest-ever net profit for the year.
